page.title: 13HOUSES
page.content: THE MAIN PART OF{WOODLEY}IS{HOUSING. THE TYPE OF{HOUSES}IN{WOODLEY}ARE {SEMI-DETACHED,BUNGALOWS}AND{TERRACED. THERE ARE MORE{SEMI-DETACHED}HOUSES THAN ANY OTHER TYPE OF{HOUSE}AND THERE ARE VERY FEW{TERRACED HOUSES}OR {BUNGALOWS}IN{WOODLEY.}MOST OF THE {HOUSES}ARE{PRIVATELY}OWNED THOUGH THERE ARE SOME{COUNCIL HOUSES. WOODLEY IS A NEW AREA SO THE{HOUSES}ARE NO MORE THAN TWENTY FIVE YEARS OLD.MORE HOUSES ARE BEING BUILT IN{WOODLEY}ALL THE TIME.THEY ARE BEING BUILT OVER WHAT WAS A{WARTIME AIRFIELD.}MORE PEOPLE ARE BUYING HOUSES AND{WOODLEY IS BECOMING A BIGGER PLACE.THE{HOUSES ARE VERY DEAR FOR EXAMPLE IT WOULD COST ABOUT{Â£45,000}FOR A{SEMI-DETACHED HOUSE AND A{DETACHED HOUSE}WOULD COST ABOUT{Â£50,000.
